alert.note: Alert for Haakon; Meade; Pennington; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 10:29AM MDT until July 05 at 11:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 AM MDT FOR WESTERN HAAKON...ZIEBACH...EASTERN MEADE AND NORTHEASTERN PENNINGTON COUNTIES... At 1029 AM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles northwest of Green Grass to 6 miles west of Creighton, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Dupree, Faith, Cherry Creek, Milesville, Plainview, Enning, Elm Springs, Red Scaffold, Billsburg, Iron Lightning, Grindstone, Creighton, South Eagle Butte, Marcus, Bridger, Howes, White Owl, Thunder Butte, Red Elm and Takini. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
